summary: Round 1 critical issues (R1, R2) are properly fixed. No new issues introduced. Ready to merge.

R1_verification.fix_quality: Correct implementation with explicit null check before API call
R1_verification.evidence: Guard checks latestRun.started_at before calling fetchStoriesCreatedSince

R2_verification.fix_quality: Proper solution using useRef to track user selection state
R2_verification.evidence: Removed selectedRunId from deps array, added hasUserSelectedRunRef to prevent auto-selection override

bonus_security_fix.quality: Excellent - blocks SQL injection and malformed input
